tradestatistics v0.4.0

  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

ots_countries

A table of official country names, ISO-3 codes and other metadata

ots_country_code()

String matching of official country names and ISO-3 codes according to the United Nations nomenclature

ots_create_tidy_data()

Downloads and processes the data from the API to return a human-readable tibble

ots_groups

A table of group codes and names associated to products

ots_inflation

A table with world weigthed mean inflation since 1962

ots_inflation_adjustment()

Expresses tidy data from the API in dollars of a reference year

ots_product_code()

String matching of official product names and Harmonized System (HS) codes according to the United Nations nomenclature

ots_product_section()

String matching of unofficial product section names and product section codes

ots_products

A table of unofficial shortened product names

ots_products

A table of official product names from the Harmonized System (HS)

ots_sections

A table of sections codes, names and colours associated to products

ots_sections_colors

A table of sections codes and hex colours associated to products

ots_sections_names

A table of sections codes and official names associated to products

ots_sections

A table of sections codes and shortened names associated to products

ots_tables

Available tables in the API
